description:
Shiryu again finds his soul at the gates of death, and sees his life "flashing before his eyes." He thinks back on the days when he was training to be a saint, and on the relationship he developed with his girlfriend Shunrei. We find Shunrei praying for Shiryu to return to her safely, but her positive and powerful thoughts of prayer are interfering with Death Masks evil energy. Death Mask worries that her prayers may help Shiryu return from the gates of death again, so, to ensure this doesn`t happen, Death Mask goes to the gates of death to finish-off Shiryu once and for all! He collects the weak Shiryu in his arms, and carries him to the mouth of death to drop him inside, but again Shunrei` s prayers begin to interfere with Death Mask`s plans. He locates Shunrei with the wide scope of his gold saint powers and throws her irito a raging waterfall. This enrages Shiryu and he uses this negative energy to attack an unsuspecting Death Mask. Stronger than ever before and vengeful for the attack on his love, Shiryu begins to lay a beating on Death Mask as we…
Source: crunchyroll
